subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Both Xavier and Cincinnati are among the 16 teams left in the N.C.A.A. tournament, three months after a fight that became one of the signature moments of college basketball’s regular season.
snippet: Both Xavier and Cincinnati are among the 16 teams left in the N.C.A.A. tournament, three months after a fight that became one of the signature moments of college basketball’s regular season.
